sharp price drop in memory it's become viable now to use your data
in a memory set instead of a database storage set like a disk so again nothing new it just allows the

it does come in different flavors and this is probably some confusion uh to customers and we're hoping to alleviate

will read the hana database and basically you're going to transform all of your info cubes and info objects and
these are some technical terms but for your bw folks they should resonate with you you convert them into hana like data

data because it's sitting in memory you don't have to worry about your aggregates and a lot of the subsequent things that you needed to worry about in
sap bw these are all taking care for you on hana so today's sap bw environment
